title: Petition for Old Headmistress Fiora
body:
that skin probably had to be the **best**, most **sexiest** skin of all skins ever made. --until it was reworked of course. 
i want to start a petition to _bring back what i paid for_. i waited a year to buy the skin actually and now i regret all the time i spent praying for its return. now it's nothing but a horrid skin. riot pls, what was so great about it? it was fun being a hot school teaching whacking baddies in league with a yard stick. now **I'M** a monster getting whacked by baddies. the visuals _affect_ my gameplay. 
tl'dr bring back old headmistress model riot pls. i cri //tears fully stacked

Edit: the old one is on the left, the new one is on the right. sorry for not clarifying.

replies.body:
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-FYLx0lS-Qok/VbGDPJPuBkI/AAAAAAAAFUI/jpNcRBYWfZQ/s1600/fiora3compare.jpg
You forgot to mention they have changed it since then.
It looks pretty fine in game honestly now.

> [{quoted}](name=gubigubi,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GRhZRWbo,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-07-26T08:32:45.845+0000)
>
> http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-FYLx0lS-Qok/VbGDPJPuBkI/AAAAAAAAFUI/jpNcRBYWfZQ/s1600/fiora3compare.jpg
> You forgot to mention they have changed it since then.
> It looks pretty fine in game honestly now.

Something about the face still looks off, to me. Like the face belongs on a younger, paler person or something.
Reminds me of this.
you do realize both of those models are still the newer ones..
This x1000. I wish people would stop throwing this model viewer image around and complaining about Fiora's appearance. It's so misleading.

Yeah its getting old. People posting images from the first release of her rework and stirring shit up on the forums with it.
Riot has made changes it looks pretty fine now.

Default Fiora is fine as is in game.
Royal Guard is still kind of :L
Night raven is better in my opinion with the update.
Head Mistress is better with the update as well because it actually has a dress that moves like the busniess suit Fiora has in that skin should move.

Now can we please move on to making new content for Fiora? Instead of having riot put resources into nit picking at this point? Because I would love to see some skins with this new model. It has some potential to look pretty sweet with a good skin line.
it's not that she is fat that i am worried about, her face/hair needs to return to the way it was before.

> [{quoted}](name=Orianna Reveck,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GRhZRWbo,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-07-26T01:22:47.376+0000)
>
> The model viewer just makes her look fat. She looks normal in game. 
> 
> http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-FYLx0lS-Qok/VbGDPJPuBkI/AAAAAAAAFUI/jpNcRBYWfZQ/s1600/fiora3compare.jpg
> 
> Go whine about something else please.

That looks fat to you?
Isn't that "new" model outdated now? They changed all of them yesterday and I saw that same stiff-bones screenshot (which has its eyelids rolled back into the head btw) before that.

they only look different in model viewer 

as in Orianna Reveck's pic I like the old one because her hair is more red than the new one, thats my only complain about  this skin 

as for default skin, I like the old darker one, the new one is too white and feelsbit like something from a fashion contest somehow IMO, her old one felt like duelist

What bothers me most about the new skin is the yardstick. HOW HARD IS IT TO PUT EVENLY SPACED LINE ON A FUCKING STICK??

If you can't get basic lines right how the hell do you expect to manage an entire visual overhaul?
Jinkies, the new one looks suspiciously familiar. Anyone got any clues why?
This was the model
wait, um... which one is old and which one is new?

> [{quoted}](name=Aeolian Melodies,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GRhZRWbo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-25T20:20:52.291+0000)
>
> wait, um... which one is old and which one is new?

I'm assuming the left one is the older one.

It's like we're trading an prettier face for a bigger rack.

Honestly the face is the only problem.
new is on the right
The one on the right is the new one.
I like the newer one better. Sorta looks like Velma from Scooby Doo.
Calm down with all the fiora rage, thy still haven't actually release anything live. + they are still going to make last minute changes before releasing her
Well, the new one is higher quality from the neck down, and I'm not sure what the latest update has done for the rest (surrender@20 only showed the default skin with the latest changes), so IDK.
IMO of all Fiora skins this one is still the best.
we need the old one back, why did they even change it in the first place
Please :-( I won't use headmistress unless they make it look better than that.
